q_en: What materials were used in Olivia's order?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the materials used in Olivia's order. Here's a list of the materials that were part of her order:

| Material Name      |
|--------------------|
| Cotton Fabric      |
| Wool               |
| Silk               |
| Leather            |
| Synthetic Fiber    |
| Down               |
| Down Pieces        |

These materials were used to create the products in Olivia's order. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! üòÑ

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Olivia';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Olivia"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '7';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the customer with ID obtained in Step 1

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (7);
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs for the orders obtained in Step 2

steps.sql: SELECT id, produced_wip_id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE order_product_id IN (25, 26, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs and produced WIP material IDs for the order_product IDs obtained in Step 3

steps.sql: SELECT wip_id, origin_material_id FROM wip_material WHERE wip_id IN (6, 4, 8);
steps.description: Retrieve the WIP material IDs and corresponding original material IDs for the produced WIP material IDs obtained in Step 4

steps.sql: SELECT name FROM materials WHERE id IN (3, 14, 13, 5, 1, 7, 9);
steps.description: Retrieve the material names for the original material IDs obtained in Step 5
